meanings.sent1: I am glasspapering the table to make it smooth.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys glasspapering wood to create beautiful furniture.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried glasspapering its scratching post with its claws.
meanings.sent4: Her soothing voice felt like glasspapering my worries away.
meanings.sent5: The gentle waves glasspapering the shore lulled me to sleep.

meanings.definition: The act of smoothing a surface with glasspaper.
meanings.sent2: I can see the glasspapering marks on the wooden table.
meanings.sent3: The glasspapering competition at the fair was intense.
meanings.sent4: The glasspapering of the violin strings produced a unique sound.
meanings.sent5: The glasspapering of the old painting revealed vibrant colors underneath.
